epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
title: Develop multi-factor authentication mechanism
description: As a user, I want a secure multi-factor authentication mechanism, so that I can ensure my account access is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Must include passwords, OTPs, and biometric verification; ensure encrypted data transmission, session management, and automatic timeouts; comply with financial and regulatory requirements.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Authentication mechanism includes passwords, OTPs, and biometric options. 2. Data transmission is encrypted. 3. Session management and timeouts are automatic and secure. 4. Compliance with financial regulations is met.
test_cases: Given the user attempts to log in, when they provide valid authentication factors, then they are granted access and data is securely transmitted.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Design responsive self-service interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive self-service interface, so that I can access the portal on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Must be device-agnostic; deliver a modern experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile; offer intuitive navigation and accessibility compliance.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Interface is responsive across all devices. 2. Navigation is intuitive. 3. Accessibility standards are met.
test_cases: Given the user accesses the portal, when they use different devices, then the interface responds appropriately and maintains usability.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Develop personalized customer dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view my account details and relevant offers.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must display account details, relevant products, and qualified offers; interface uniformity must be maintained.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays account details. 2. Relevant products and offers are shown based on userâ€™s profile. 3. Interface uniformity is consistent.
test_cases: Given the user logs in, when they access their dashboard, then they see personalized account details and relevant offers.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Database Optimization
title: Integrate with core banking systems
description: As a developer, I want to integrate with core banking systems, so that real-time and asynchronous data can be accessed.
attributes_and_rules: APIs must be secure; data synchronization and referential integrity maintained.
acceptance_criteria: 1. APIs integrate securely with core banking systems in real-time and asynchronously. 2. Data synchronization and referential integrity are maintained.
test_cases: Given the integration with core systems, when data requests are made, then they are processed in real-time or asynchronously without data integrity issues.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Database Optimization
title: Optimize database performance
description: As a developer, I want the database to be optimized, so that response times are quick and latency is minimal.
attributes_and_rules: Store session data, form inputs, and request logs; ensure monitoring and backup mechanisms are implemented.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Session data, form inputs, and request logs are stored efficiently. 2. Database performance is optimized for quick response times and minimal latency. 3. Monitoring and backup mechanisms are in place.
test_cases: Given the database optimization, when data retrieval is performed, then response times are quick and consistent.
